subtitle: Release Notes for Open Liberty 20.0.0.1 on Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform

abstract.para: These release notes contain the latest information about new features, enhancements, fixes, and issues contained in Open Liberty 2020 on Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform release.

legalnotice.para: Code and build scripts are licensed under the Eclipse Public License v1 Documentation files are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NoDerivatives 4.0 International (CC BY-ND 4.0)
